title: Fruits de mer with homemade rye bread and whipped butter
description: Fresh seafood is one of life’s joys - just add warm (homemade) bread, lightly whipped butter and mayo.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz wholegrain rye flour, plus extra for dusting
1 unwaxed lemon, juice and finely grated zest
salt and freshly ground black pepper
